title: Klee Wyck (TEFC)
creator_credit: Graham McInnes, ONF | NFB and Grant Crabtree
brief_description: The story of painter Emily Carr, ‘Klee Wyck’ or ‘Laughing One’ to her Indian friends. This famous Canadian artist has found inspiration for her work in British Columbia’s Pacific coast, its forest of giant trees and its Indian villages with their totems and carvings. Her canvases are shown with the scenes where they were painted. Editing, Cecily Sparks. Music, Maurice Blackburn.
